title: Kaweco Frosted Sport Fountain Pen I Premium Fountain Pen Luxury for Ink Cartridges with High-Quality Steel Nib I Sport Fountain Pen 13.5 cm Natural Coconut BB (Extra Wide)
features: Reliable every day. The Kaweco Sport fountain pen with high-quality steel nib made in Germany is available in five different widths and is therefore ideal for any font type
Over 100 years of Kaweco Sport classic design made of high-quality plastic in historical colours – convinces with the latest technology – pleasant feel and a noticeably soft writing feeling
Compact and light: the 20 g lightweight Kaweco fountain pen has an ideal pocket size (cap attached 13 cm) with closed cap (10.5 cm) I Kaweco ink in different colours is sold separately

Quality since 1883: The production is carried out by hand and individually inspected in the pencil city of Nuremberg. First-class quality functionality and best service have always been at the forefront of our philosophy
The perfect writing tool is guaranteed to be found in our extensive range - from pencils to fountain pens to ballpoint pens
description: In 1911, something special was created with the Kaweco Sport The pocket fountain pen has only a size of 10.5 cm when closed and can therefore be easily carried with you. With inverted cap, it grows to a normal size of 13 cm.
